verses.name: Leviticus 25:36
verses.text: Take thou no usury of him, or increase: but fear thy God; that thy brother may live with thee.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:37
verses.text: Thou shalt not give him thy money upon usury, nor lend him thy victuals for increase.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:38
verses.text: I am the Lord your God, which brought you forth out of the land of Egypt, to give you the land of Canaan, and to be your God.

verses.name: Leviticus 25:39
verses.text: And if thy brother that dwelleth by thee be waxen poor, and be sold unto thee; thou shalt not compel him to serve as a bondservant:
